column1: Little Goat Diner////I really wanted to like this place
column2: but was not so satisfied. We ordered the chili cheese fries
column3: which were excellent! But the little piggy went to china was just salty! I couldn't eat the whole thing. I read some other reviews here
column4: complaining the food was salty. Maybe the management takes notice
column5: and does something about it. I really liked the over all ambiance
column6: and interesting variety in their menu. I would give this place another chance
column7: after I get that salty taste still lingering off.
